biotools.summary: F-divergence Cutoff Index finds DEGs in the transcriptomic & proteomic data, and identifies DEGs by computing the difference between the distribution of fold-changes for the control-control and remaining (non-differential) case-control gene expression ratio data. This tool provides several advantages compared to existing methods.

bioschemas.name: fCI
